videos.description: Evan Fournier makes a beautiful pass to Taj Gibson for a basket as the Knicks close the gap.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Evan Fournier makes beautiful pass for a basket) 2022/02/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Evan Fournier makes beautiful pass for a basket

videos.description: Julius Randle gets the and-1 and gives the Knicks the lead after a 12-0 deficit.

videos.headline: Julius Randle gets a smooth and-1

videos.description: Quentin Grimes gets the basket plus the foul, with an opportunity for a 4-point play for the Knicks.

videos.headline: Quentin Grimes gets the 3 plus the foul

videos.description: Greg Brown III gets up high to finish off the points for the Trail Blazers.

videos.headline: Greg Brown III flies high for the beautiful slam
